        @RequestMapping(value="/add_category")
public java.lang.String category(java.lang.String content,
                                                                         org.springframework.ui.Model model)
                                                                  throws org.postgresql.util.PSQLException
        Mapping for addCategory, this option is visible only for users with Admin rights, with this method we can add new category
        Parameters:
        content - - content of new category
        model - - current model
        Returns:
        new category with ident
        Throws:
        org.postgresql.util.PSQLException - when something wrong happens with database

        replyto - - id of topic to which have reply be mapped
